this_title: آخرین بار کی سحر را دیدی؟
trans_title: 你上次见到萨哈尔是什么时候？
Akharin Bar Key Sahar Ra Didi
When Did You See Sahar Last Time?
introduction: The movie is about human rights especially women rights which describing worse Mindset of people about women`S position in society ... the movie starts like: Sahar`s mother is in the police station and says my daughter didn`t come back home last night ...) Sahar is a divorced woman in society of Iran with all problems and hardships... FAJR film festival in Iran . and movie was candidate in 5 parts for SEEMORGH award .
chinese_title: 你上次见到萨哈尔是什么时候？
foreign_title: آخرین بار کی سحر را دیدی؟
